document_description: The regulations set energy efficiency standards for induction motors, preventing the manufacturing, sale, import, marketing or exhibition of Boilers or generators for hot water, hot air or thermal oil with an output greater than 580 kilowatts, if they fail to meet the standards set in the regulations.
